summary: A story about Serbian football team that decides to follow a dream that takes them on a journey to the First World Football Championship in Montevideo, Uruguay in 1930. A dream that allows them to become true stars and living legends.
cast: Milos Bikovic|Petar Strugar|Nina Jankovic|Danina Jeftic|Vojin Cetkovic|Viktor Savic|Nikola Djuricko|Nebojsa Ilic|Milutin 'Mima' Karadzic|Branimir Brstina|Sergej Trifunovic|Predrag Vasic|Gordana Djurdjevic|Anita Mancic|Marko Nikolic|Darko Tomovic|Boris Komnenic|Srdjan Timarov|Srdjan 'Zika' Todorovic|Slobodan 'Boda' Ninkovic|Marko Zivic|Dragan Petrovic-Pele|Aleksandar Sreckovic|Danijel Sic|Aleksandar Radojicic|Uros Jovcic|Bojan Krivokapic|Andrija Kuzmanovic|Nenad Herakovic|Rade Cosic|Milan Nikitovic|Aleksandar Filimonovic|Tamara Dragicevic|Marko Kopp|Aleksandra Alac|Enis Beslagic|Aleksej Bjelogrlic|Slobodan Custic|Bojan Dimitrijevic|Musa Halilovic|Dusan Jovanovic|Marija Jovanovic|Hrvoje Keckes|Dragan Kuzmanovic|Branislav Lecic|Roberto Magnifico|Ivan Mileusnic|Sim√©on Mirzayantz|Predrag Mitrovic|Vesna Novakovic|Ognjen Ostojic|Ivana Perkunic|Vladimir Mica Popovic|Martina Rajic|Nikola Ristanovski|Mihaela Stamenkovic|Stefan Trifkovic|Bojan Zirovic|Sonja Zivanovic|Bozidar Zuber
title: Montevideo, Bog te video!
